channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Flexi Quote Rotator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Flexi Quote Rotator

item.title: CVE-2022-2328|2024-08-03T00:32:09.342Z -- unknown -- flexi%20quote%20rotator
item.description: The Flexi Quote Rotator WordPress plugin through 0.9.4 does not sanitise and escape its settings, allowing high privilege users such as admin to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed.
